title: Why read books, not screens?
description: Why is it better to read from a book than a screen?

vocabItems.definition: the length of time that someone can keep their thoughts concentrated and fixed on one thing

vocabItems.word: (do something) for the joy of it
vocabItems.definition: do an activity simply for the pleasure of doing it, rather than as a means to gain something else
quickly and superficially looking at what can be easily understood, rather than understanding the full depth of something
comparison between things that have similar features
guess, opinion or conclusion that you make based on the information you already have
reading rapidly in order to get a general overview of the text being read
